I would switch to a plant-based diet and grow my own fruits, vegetables, and grains. I would use hydroponics or vertical gardens to maximize space and efficiency.
I would hunt and fish for meat and seafood. I would use sustainable and ethical methods to ensure the health of the animals and the environment.
I would forage for wild edibles such as nuts, berries, and mushrooms. I would learn how to identify and prepare these foods safely.
I would join a community garden or urban farm to grow my own food. I would collaborate with other members to share resources and knowledge.
I would purchase locally grown and sustainably produced food from smalls and co-ops. I would support farmers who use regenerative farming practices to protect the soil ands.
